plays.text: Penalty to Daniel Sedin 2 minutes for Holding Jaroslav Hlinka
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Interference Daniel Sedin
Penalty to Kurt Sauer 2 minutes for Tripping Jannik Hansen
Goal scored by Henrik Sedin assisted by Taylor Pyatt and Brad Isbister
Penalty to Daniel Sedin 2 minutes for Hooking Jeff Finger
Goal scored by John-Michael Liles (Power Play) assisted by Milan Hejduk and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Mike Weaver 2 minutes for Hooking Joe Sakic
Goal scored by Henrik Sedin assisted by Daniel Sedin and Alexander Edler
